languages.text: Встав на путь покаяния, Хротко может спастись в глазах Императора и принести пользу династии.
By taking the path of repentance, Hrotko can save himself in the eyes of the Emperor and benefit the dynasty.
languages.original_text: Встав на путь покаяния, Хротко может спастись в глазах Императора и принести пользу династии.

traits.locale_text: By taking the path of repentance, Hrotko can save himself in the eyes of the Emperor and benefit the dynasty.
By taking the path of repentance, Hrotko can save himself in the eyes of the Emperor and benefit the dynasty.
By taking the path of repentance, Hrotko can save himself in the eyes of the Emperor and benefit the dynasty.
By taking the path of repentance, Hrotko can save himself in the eyes of the Emperor and benefit the dynasty.
By taking the path of repentance, Hrotko can save himself in the eyes of the Emperor and benefit the dynasty.

languages.text: En optant pour la voie du repentir, Hrotko peut se racheter aux yeux de l'Empereur et servir les intérêts de la dynastie.
languages.original_text: By taking the path of repentance, Hrotko can save himself in the eyes of the Emperor and benefit the dynasty.

traits.locale_text: En optant pour la voie du repentir, Hrotko peut se racheter aux yeux de l'Empereur et servir les intérêts de la dynastie.

languages.text: Al arrepentirse, Hrotko puede salvarse a los ojos del Emperador y beneficiar a la dinastía.
languages.original_text: By taking the path of repentance, Hrotko can save himself in the eyes of the Emperor and benefit the dynasty.

traits.locale_text: Al arrepentirse, Hrotko puede salvarse a los ojos del Emperador y beneficiar a la dinastía.

languages.text: 悔悟の道を歩むことで、フロトコは皇帝の目から自らを救い、王朝に利益をもたらすことができる。
languages.original_text: By taking the path of repentance, Hrotko can save himself in the eyes of the Emperor and benefit the dynasty.

traits.locale_text: 悔悟の道を歩むことで、フロトコは皇帝の目から自らを救い、王朝に利益をもたらすことができる。

languages.text: 赫洛卡踏上了忏悔的旅途，在帝皇的指引下得到救赎，造福王朝。
languages.original_text: By taking the path of repentance, Hrotko can save himself in the eyes of the Emperor and benefit the dynasty.

traits.locale_text: 赫洛卡踏上了忏悔的旅途，在帝皇的指引下得到救赎，造福王朝。

languages.text: Indem er den Weg der Buße beschreitet, kann sich Hrotko in den Augen des Imperators retten und der Dynastie dienen.
languages.original_text: By taking the path of repentance, Hrotko can save himself in the eyes of the Emperor and benefit the dynasty.

traits.locale_text: Indem er den Weg der Buße beschreitet, kann sich Hrotko in den Augen des Imperators retten und der Dynastie dienen.

languages.text: Hrotko, tövbekârlık yolunu seçebilir ve İmparator'un gözünde kendini kurtarıp hanedanlığa fayda sağlayabilir.
languages.original_text: By taking the path of repentance, Hrotko can save himself in the eyes of the Emperor and benefit the dynasty.
